txt.en: 'Your companion's head will make a fine trophy, but you owe the line of Azog a great debt... and I am here to collect it!'
'All right, that's enough fun! Get 'em lads!'
'Lads?'
Instance: Undermining UshkÃºtoz
'Where're the rest of my lads? What did you do, dwarf?!'
<rgb=#FF0000>We have them! Do it now!</rgb>
'The Helmbreaker and the Firebringer? I'm still more than a match for you old dwarves!'
All of a sudden you hear rapid footsteps in the distance!
'Ah, but my lads here could use a bit of sport. Do what you will... but leave Old Brokentooth to me!
'Glory... to Gorgar! Glory... to... Bolg....'
'Hah! Did you think your little ambush would actually work?'
'Just like old times!'
'Kept you waiting, Agnar? Haha!'
'Khazâd ai-mênu!'
'Lági! Reithvald! You had me worried for a moment, but I knew we could do it!'
'Quiet! I hear them ahead.'
'If you can get closer without them noticing, perhaps we can see if Kraznákh is among them. Go on!'
'Swiftly now, [placeholder]! It will not be long before we are discovered!'
'Kraznákh is not with them? Let's slay them while we can!'
'For the Gabil'akkâ!'
'Still got some fight in you, do you? I'm going to enjoy this!'
'Nar! How'd one of you filthy dwarves get in here?'
'...a trap. Bah!'
'Ah, Old Brokentooth! I knew you'd come!'
